title: x/build/cmd/godash: respect R= in commit message
body:
Currently the release dashboard only respects "R=go1.8" in replies to Gerrit CLs. It should also recognize this marker in the commit message.

People clearly expect this to happen. For example: https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/24818/ and https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/24901/. Putting it in the commit message would also be more convenient than replying to your own CL if you're uploading a CL that's meant for the next release.
